mapper.sql: a.id,a.area,a.township,a.village_street,a.volunteer_number,a.name,a.sex,a.age,a.education,a.meeting_time,a.approval_time, a.talker,a.create_date,a.create_by,a.update_date,a.update_by,a.remark,a.pic_path,a.status,b.name AS areaName,c.name AS townName,d.name AS villageName
LEFT JOIN p_dept b ON a.area = b.id LEFT JOIN p_dept c ON a.township = c.id LEFT JOIN p_dept d ON a.village_street = d.id
mapper.insert: insert into p_member (id, area, township, village_street, volunteer_number, name, sex, age, education, meeting_time, approval_time, talker, create_date, create_by, update_date, update_by, remark,pic_path,status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{township,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{villageStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{volunteerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{meetingTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{approvalTime,jdbcType=DATE}, #{talker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into p_member
id,
area,
township,
village_street,

name,
sex,

meeting_time,
approval_time,
talker,
create_date,

update_by,
remark,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{township,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{villageStreet,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{volunteerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{meetingTime,jdbcType=DATE},

mapper.select:
select
from p_member a
where a.is_del = "0"
and (a.name like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%') or a.volunteer_number like concat('%',#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%'))
and a.status like concat('%',#{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and a.area like concat('%',#{area,jdbcType=VARCHAR},'%')
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(meeting_time) > UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{start})
and UNIX_TIMESTAMP(meeting_time) <= UNIX_TIMESTAMP(#{end})
mapper.delete: UPDATE p_member SET is_del = "1" where id = #{id,jdbcType = INTEGER}
mapper.update: update p_member set area = #{area,jdbcType=INTEGER}, township = #{township,jdbcType=INTEGER}, village_street = #{villageStreet,jdbcType=INTEGER}, volunteer_number = #{volunteerNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, sex = #{sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, age = #{age,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, education = #{education,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, meeting_time = #{meetingTime,jdbcType=DATE}, approval_time = #{approvalTime,jdbcType=DATE}, talker = #{talker,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_date = #{updateDate,jdbcType=DATE}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, pic_path = #{picPath,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
UPDATE p_member SET status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, no_agree_reason = #{no_agree_reason,jdbcType=VARCHAR} WHERE id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
